name: Django
description: Django means “I awake,” in Romani, and this upbeat sativa will have you saying just that. Active and light, this strain’s effects might not be great for those looking for pain relief or strong relaxation. But if you want to lift your mood without losing energy, Django is just the thing.
attributes_title: Energetic, Uplifted, Happy, Talkative, Euphoric, Stress, Depression, Fatigue, Insomnia, Muscle Spasms, Dry Mouth, Headache, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Anxious
